publ: by Life This Side Of Heaven
name: LifeThisSideOfHeaven
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Listen to devotions for your day every Monday to Saturday. Join us as we rejoice in God's grace, knowing from His Word that He loves us and forgives us, and confident that He is with us every step of the way – on this side of heaven. Devotions for real life.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
